column4: Hey is anyone able to help me with my question posted on the boards?  My post is here and it concerns a boot problem after dmraid is installed ->http://ubuntuforums.org/showthread.php?p=4023246#post4023246
it seems like your initrd might be damaged?
this problem happens every time I do a fresh install...Ive tried it 5 times, all the same result.
sorry i can't be of more help, i don't really do any software raid
